alert.note: Alert for Cottle; Crosby; Dickens; Garza; Kent; King; Motley (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 3:02AM CDT until July 16 at 3:15AM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN KENT...DICKENS...GARZA...WESTERN KING...SOUTHERN CROSBY...SOUTHEASTERN MOTLEY AND SOUTHERN COTTLE COUNTIES... At 302 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles east of Dumont to 3 miles west of Girard to 5 miles southeast of Post, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Post, Spur, Dickens, Guthrie, White River Lake, Kalgary, Girard, Afton, Caprock, Grow, Southland, Dumont, Finney, Delwin and Chalk. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Cottle; Crosby; Dickens; Garza; Kent; King; Motley
